attributes.action: Put a 10p bottle deposit on plastic bottles to save our Oceans!
attributes.additional_details: The 10p is not a tax as it is refunded when the bottle is recycled.
attributes.background: In the world today 1 refuge truck of plastics are dumped into our oceans every minute. 1/3 of these plastics are single use plastics such as plastic bottles. Such a deposit in Michigan has risen beverage container recycling to 97% conpared to the US average of 33%.
